Our Adventures

And a future of many more.

We may as well start here...

How It Started

Anneli and Sam met when Sam accompanied his friend (also named Sam, but who we will refer to as Hincksy to avoid confusion) and crashed Anneli’s pumpkin-carving party in early October of 2013. Since it is not every day that someone that good looking walks into your apartment unannounced, Anneli was determined to catch his eye. She walked right up to him and wittingly said, “Hi, I’m Anneli, welcome to my house!” Potentially due to the heady fumes from the raw pumpkin pulp, even though Sam and Anneli got along swimmingly that first night, no phone number was transferred. They were not fated to see each other again until a couple weeks later when, prompted by the same friend, Hincksy, Anneli crashed an unknown neighbor’s party where she was reunited with Sam Woolf. Thanks to the help of Anneli’s roommate, Lauren, numbers were successfully transferred and a first date was scheduled.

The (first) Big Test

Everyone who knows Sam well knows that Sam is a lover of rules, games, and tests (but only the ones that he makes up, of course). [...Tell the story of New Zealand as a test of being together…]
